resources.string: Each appliance has a label with information about the appliance, which looks similar like the image below.
Changing type of inventory management from Exact to Generic will cause you to lose all data related to bottle position.
Changing type of inventory management from Generic to Exact will put all your wines into unplaced positions. You can position them by scanning the bottle labels.
They are located mostly on the inside of a door or door frame, or on the back/bottom of the appliance.

We are sorry that you do not want to use ConnectLife anymore. By selecting “delete account” all your user data and all your appliance pairings will be deleted. All usage related data will be aggregated and anonymized
We’re sorry to see you go!
Email Address is Already Registered, do you want to bind it and update the User Information?

We are sorry that you do not want to use ConnectLife anymore. By selecting “delete account” all your user data and all your appliance pairings will be deleted. All usage related data will be aggregated and anonymized.
We\'re sorry to see you go!
Are you sure you want to delete your ConnectLife account?
Untuk menyambungkan peranti ke ConnectLife, anda perlu menetapkan rangkaian peranti terlebih dahulu
Wine found in Inventory. What would you like to do with it?
You can add additional information on your wine, such as notes, aging time and when it\'s best to serve it.
Anda boleh mencari botol wain yang dialih keluar menggunakan penapis di penjuru kanan sebelah atas inventori anda.
Versi apl ini sudah lapuk. Sila pasang versi terkini untuk terus menggunakan ConnectLife.
Terdapat versi baharu, sila kemas kini aplikasi
New version is available. Please update application.
Appliance pairing failed. Please make sure that the appliance is in pairing mode and try again.
Please enable location access in the settings

Please enter the verification code from the email to continue.
We have sent an email with verification code to %s
Email successfully updated! \10Use the new email to log in.
Please enter the verification code from the email %s to continue.
Kod yang diterima adalah sah selama 10 minit.
%1$s tidak akan berfungsi melainkan anda mendayakan perkhidmatan Google Play.
%1$s tidak akan berfungsi tanpa perkhidmatan Google Play dan perkhidmatan ini tiada pada peranti anda.
%1$s menghadapi masalah berhubung perkhidmatan Google Play. Sila cuba lagi.
%1$s tidak akan berfungsi tanpa perkhidmatan Google Play dan perkhidmatan ini tidak disokong oleh peranti anda.
%1$s tidak akan berfungsi kecuali anda mengemas kini perkhidmatan Google Play.
%1$s tidak akan berfungsi tanpa perkhidmatan Google Play dan perkhidmatan ini sedang dikemaskinikan.
Versi baharu perkhidmatan Google Play diperlukan. Kemas kini automatik akan dijalankan sebentar lagi.

Kami memohon maaf kerana anda tidak mahu menggunakan ConnectLife lagi. Dengan memilih padam akaun semua data pengguna anda dan semua gandingan perkakas anda akan dipadamkan. Semua data berkaitan penggunaan akan diagregatkan dan dianonimkan.
Appliance must be connected to a Wi-Fi network in order to pair your appliance with the ConnectLife app.

1. Pastikan perkakas anda dihidupkan\102. Buka menu perkakas dan pergi ke Tetapan, kemudian pilih Persediaan Rangkaian.\103. Pilih Wi-Fi rumah yang ingin anda sambungkan daripada senarai.\104. Masukkan tetapan Wi-Fi rumah.\105. Imbas kod QR yang dijana menggunakan aplikasi ConnectLife.
Buat profil pengguna anda dan mula menggunakan \10ConnectLife dengan peralatan anda.
We have sent the verification code to %s. Please enter the verification code to continue.
Dear user, your personal information has been deleted from server.
This wine has been deleted from the inventory and cannot be selected.
This email address is already taken. Please try another.
This email has not been registered.
Klik sekali lagi untuk keluar dari ConnectLife
Kami mengemas kini perisian tegar perkakas dengan kerap untuk meningkatkan pengalaman anda. Dapatkan ciri terkini dengan mengemas kini perisian tegar.
Adakah anda pasti mahu memadamkan akaun ConnectLife anda?
This function is not open yet.
How would you like to add wine data?
The safe range for long-term wine storage is 50% – 80%. A short change in humidity won’t affect the quality of the wine. This can happen simply by opening the door.
Kata laluan mestilah 8 hingga 50 aksara panjang dan terdiri daripada huruf dan nombor. Simbol adalah pilihan.
Tetapkan peranti kepada keadaan operasi biasa. Jika simbol Wi-Fi tidak ditunjukkan pada paparan, ketik ikon gear untuk memasuki menu tetapan.
Di sebelah kiri paparan, gunakan kekunci anak panah kiri dan navigasi ke GA.
Di sebelah kanan paparan, gunakan kekunci anak panah kanan untuk bertukar daripada OF kepada ON. Simbol Wi-Fi akan muncul.
Di sebelah kiri paparan, gunakan kekunci anak panah kanan dan navigasi ke Gb. CS akan muncul di sebelah kanan.
Lets you keep track of the exact position of each bottle. Precise maintenance of the inventory is required. This will provide you with a detailed overview of all wines.
Lets you keep track of the shelf on which each bottle is positioned. Not as detailed as Exact positioning, but it takes less time to maintain.
To show wines that you have removed from the inventory, uncheck the Is in inventory.
It contains instructions on resetting your password.

The location service is turned off. We need you to provide us with the information of your country, so that we can match the data service center for you and provide you with efficient device networking services. Please open the location service.

Location Services is turned off. We need you to provide us with your country information so that we can match you with a data service center and provide you with efficient device networking services. Please turn on location services.
Please enter the verification code that you received by email.
Use any of the options below to sign in.
Manually enter the unique ID on the appliance. Enter the code below to connect with the appliance.
Manually enter the unique ID on the appliance with a 37-digit code on it.Enter the code below to connect with the appliance.
The maximum number of IP registrations has been reached.
The maximum number of IP password resets has been reached.
The system detects that you do not have permission to select photos
Tetapan ini tidak akan mengubah bahasa aplikasi. Ia digunakan untuk tujuan komunikasi sahaja.
To use all of the great features of the ConnectLife wine climate cabinet, please pair the device.
The latest firmware is already installed on all appliances.
No items need to be removed.
We’re not sure about this wine.
One last step. To recognize your appliance give it a name
Open appliance manual for more info
Please turn on the remote control switch
Pair appliance to your account. Appliance has your home WiFi settings set up.
Pairing failed, please check whether the paired device is correct
Hanya pasangkan pengguna lain ke peranti anda. Peranti anda perlu disediakan dan disambungkan ke rangkaian rumah anda. Jika tidak, pilih PENYEDIAAN SAMBUNGAN dahulu.
Tetapkan peranti kepada keadaan operasi biasa.\10Ketik dan tahan simbol Wi-Fi selama 2 saat untuk memasuki menu Wi-Fi.
Bahagian kiri paparan akan menunjukkan GA dan sebelah kanan On.\10Jika sebelah kanan paparan menunjukkan OF, gunakan kekunci anak panah kiri untuk mendayakan Wi-Fi peranti.
Menggunakan kekunci anak panah di sebelah kiri paparan, pilih GC. Yang betul akan menunjukkan AP.
Sahkan AP dengan kunci pengesahan. AP dan kunci pengesahan akan mula berkelip.\10Klik SETERUSNYA untuk meneruskan.
The new password cannot be same as old password.
Please select a country or region
Please click “+ ” in the upper \10 right corner to add items
Please enter the password again to confirm
Please enter a new password for login
The password is incorrect for 5 consecutive times, please reset the password
AUID or SN is normally also on the appliance package and on the user manuals of the appliance.
Please read the terms and conditions first to continue.
Please read the privacy policy first to continue.
Please agree to the Privacy Policy and Terms and Conditions to create your ConnectLife account.

Your use of this application is subject to End User License Agreement. You can click below to give your express consent to the End User License Agreement and Data Protection Policy, or cancel to leave this application.
You are all set to start using ConnectLife
Agree to End User Terms And Conditions
Use any of the options below to register.

You can reposition the wine later after scanning.
Request failed. Please try again later.
This app may not work correctly without the requested permissions.
To reset your ConnectLife password, enter the email address you use to sign in.
Masukkan alamat e-mel anda dan kami akan menghantar kod pengesahan kepada anda untuk masuk semula ke akaun anda.
E-mel telah dihantar! Sila ikut arahan dalam e-mel untuk meneruskan. Kod yang diterima sah selama 10 minit.
Masukkan kod pengesahan dan kata laluan baharu di bawah.
The password for your ConnectLife account has been reset.
Create a new password for your ConnectLife account.
Tetapkan semula kepada tetapan kilang /// //// Tetapan semula kilang
Try retaking the photo, focusing on the label.
Appliance is in Sabbath mode. To use the remote controll of the appliance disable Sabbath mode on the appliance.
Save wine to wine climate cabinet inventory.

Untuk setiap botol anda boleh memasukkan dalam inventori digital kedudukan tepat pada rak. Jika anda ingin menukar susunan botol di rak, kedudukan baharu botol perlu dimasukkan semula. Apabila anda ingin mencari wain tertentu, kedudukan tepat wain itu akan ditunjukkan, jika inventori diselenggara dengan baik.

Untuk setiap botol anda boleh memasukkan dalam inventori digital tahap rak di mana botol diletakkan. Anda boleh menukar kedudukan botol pada rak tanpa perlu melaraskan kedudukan dalam inventori digital. Apabila anda ingin mencari wain tertentu, anda perlu melihat semua botol di rak walaupun anda boleh menambah susunan logik pada pilihan anda.
WHERE CAN I FIND THE AUID/SN?
Select the number of bottles to store.
select how light modes correspond to user actions
Select the zone and position in which to save wine to the inventory.
Select the zone and shelf on which to save the wine in the wine climate cabinet inventory.
Select zone and shelf on which to save wine in wine climate cabinet inventory.

Perkhidmatan sedang dalam penyelenggaraan buat sementara waktu. Anda boleh menghantar tiket perkhidmatan kemudian.
Untuk membuat tiket perkhidmatan sila isikan maklumat hubungan pengguna tambahan.
Perkhidmatan sedang dalam penyelenggaraan buat sementara waktu. Sila cuba sebentar lagi.

Kami merasa dukacita kerana anda meninggalkan kami!

To view all UNPLACED bottles, the list view will be opened with the Only unplaced filter applied. Do you want to continue?

SIGN IN TO YOUR CONNECTLIFE ACCOUNT
Sign out failed, please try again!
Simply pair another user to your appliance. This requires, that your appliance was already set up before and is connected to your home network. If not, go back and select CONNECTION SETUP.
In the exact mode, the details of the single temperature zone wine cabinet are not expanded
start time cannot be the same as end time
Wine will be stored to the Inventory without information on shelf position.

Switch to the settings of your phone and open the WiFi settings.Connect to the network name HIS-xxxx. If you receive a message there is no internet,confirm to stay connected.Return back to the ConnectLife app and continue.
12 °C is as close as possible to an authentic wine cellar environment, so all kinds of wines can be stored safely.
To save wine in inventory, select the number of bottles and zone.
